title: Big Bill Morganfield - 2013 - Blues With A Mood FLAC
description:
Big Bill Morganfield - 2013 - Blues With A Mood

Blues With A Mood "Blues With A Mood" documents the continuing musical journey of Big Bill Morganfield. This moody collection of 11 blues tunes, 7 of which were written by Morganfield himself, showcase not only his incredible vocal stamina, but also feature the guitar virtuosos Eddie Taylor Jr., Bob Margolin and Colin Linden, in addition to Morganfield's own extraordinary guitar stylingÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s. Big Bill says, Ã¢â‚¬Å“ I wanted to put together a set of tunes with heavy grooves and deep moods which stay close to the musical genre of HowlinÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ Wolf, John Lee Hooker, Muddy Waters, and several other of my musical heroÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s.Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ Augie Meyers, Steve Guyger, Jim Horn, Tom Ã¢â‚¬Å“MookieÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ Brill, Chuck Cotton, Doc Malone, and Clark Stern make up the rest of the supporting musicians on Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½Blues With A Mood."
